    • Method Detail

      • getMask

        public int getMask(int entityId,
                   Clipping clipping,
                   int localX,
                   int localY,
                   int plane)

        Get's a clipping mask for the tile at localX, localY, plane

        Parameters:
        entityId - The region entity id
        clipping - The clipping to get the mask from
        localX - The local x coordinate of the wall
        localY - The local y coordinate of the wall
        plane - The plane coordinate of the wall

      • addObject

        public void addObject(int entityId,
                      int localX,
                      int localY,
                      int plane,
                      short sizeX,
                      short sizeY,
                      boolean solid,
                      boolean notAlternative)

        Adds clipping masks for an object

        Parameters:
        entityId - The region entity id
        localX - The local x coordinate of the object
        localY - The local y coordinate of the object
        plane - The plane coordinate of the object
        sizeX - The width of the object
        sizeY - The height of the object
        solid - Whether the object is solid
        notAlternative - Whether the objects clipping can be ignored on an alternative route
